#This file is autogenerated! Don't modify it directly!!!
russian_greenland_area_scripted_country_name = { #Grumant, historical
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
                court_language = language:russian_language
                culture.language = language:russian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:russian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:russian_language
                }
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:greenland_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

                    culture.language = language:russian_language
                }
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:baja_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
russian_tahejoc_area_scripted_country_name = { #Lisyanskiya
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
                court_language = language:russian_language
                culture.language = language:russian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:russian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:russian_language
                }
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:tahejoc_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
